general_advisory: Harvestable produce i.e., matured fruits, vegetables and flowers must be harvested and marketed to avoid deterioration of quality due to chances of occurrence of rain. Apply frequent light irrigation to summer paddy seedlings in the nursery if required. Cover vegetable crops with polythene without holes to protect from the rain. Remove covers during the daytime. Take plant protection measures to prevent diseases and pests. Use insecticides in the afternoon to avoid disturbing Honeybees. Always use flat-fan or flood-jet nozzle for herbicide spraying.
